title: Hour 2 - College Football, David Pollack, Richard Roeper
itunes:title: Hour 2 - College Football, David Pollack, Richard Roeper
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan does a deep dive into some of Saturday's huge college football matchups. Also, ESPN college football analyst David Pollack stops by to discuss favorite movies, Notre Dame-Ohio State, quarterback Joe Burrow's magical season at LSU, the drawbacks of being a defensive player in college football, and more! Finally, a discussion about an obscure Colin Farrell film with surprise guest Richard Roeper.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
